actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clayton Act to aid the private enforcement of the antitrust laws, by extending the common law of collateral estoppel to litigated antitrust judgements.

summary.text: Amends the Clayton Act to repeal the provision which renders a final judgment or decree in a criminal or civil action brought under this Act prima facie evidence against a defendant in a subsequent action brought by any other party, in order to permit the application of the doctrine of collateral estoppel to litigated antitrust judgments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clayton Act to aid the private enforcement of the antitrust laws, by extending the common law of collateral estoppel to litigated antitrust judgements.
